root.name: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Portable
root.description: A PSP RPG with visual novel elements, based on the Puella Magi Madoka Magica series.A video game based on the series titled Puella Magi Madoka Magica Portable (魔法少女まどか☆マギカ ポータブル Mahō Shōjo Madoka Magika Pōtaburu) for the PlayStation Portable was released by Namco Bandai Games on March 15, 2012. The game allows players to take many routes, changing the fate of the original storyline. Gen Urobuchi (writer of Saya no Uta game and Madoka anime) returns as the writer with Shaft doing the animation production on the title, while Yusuke Tomizawa and Yoshinao Doi act as producers. The game was released in two editions, a standard box including a bonus DVD, and a limited edition box containing a Madoka Figma, a bonus Blu-ray Disc, a Kyubey pouch, a 'HomuHomu' handkerchief and a special clear card.
